dcterms:creator: O. Mees
A. Eitel
W. Burgard
dcterms:description: The InOutDoor (IOD) Dataset consists of a total of 8,300 RGB-D images, each with a resolution of 950x540 pixels at 30 Hz. The dataset contains four image sequences of people, including groups of up to six people, walking under varying lighting conditions. Images were obtained from a Microsoft Kinect sensor mounted on the top of a mobile robot in both an indoor and outdoor campus environment.
dcterms:title: InOutDoor (IOD) Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Munaro
E. Menegatti
dcterms:description: The Kinect Tracking Precision (KTP) Dataset consists of 8,475 RGB images with a resolution of 640x480 pixels at 30 Hz. The images are obtained from a side-mounted Microsoft Kinect sensor on a mobile robot in an indoor office environment. The dataset contains four RGB sequences representing arc, still, rotation, and translation robot motion patterns, with a total of 14,766 instances of people.
dcterms:title: Kinect Tracking Precision (KTP) Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Pereira
G. Carvalho
L. Garrote
U. J. Nunes
dcterms:description: The ISR Tracking (ISRT) Dataset consists of 10,000 RGB images with a resolution of 640x480 pixels at 30 Hz. The images are obtained from an Intel RealSense D435 sensor mounted on a mobile robot in an indoor university campus setting. The dataset includes annotations for ten different object classes, including a person class, and contains groups of up to five people with scenarios of occlusions and diverse poses.
dcterms:title: ISR Tracking (ISRT) Dataset

dcterms:description: The Robots in Crowded People Conferences (R-CPC) Dataset consists of 2,575 RGB-D images collected from three different indoor university campus conferences using a mobile robot. The dataset includes scenarios of the robot guiding a crowd of people and contains dense crowds with various occlusions and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Robots in Crowded People Conferences (R-CPC) Dataset
